mapper.select: SELECT * FROM seckill_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND goods_id = #{goodsId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seckill_order (user_id, goods_id, seckill_goods_id, order_no, status, create_time, pay_amount) VALUES (#{userId}, #{goodsId}, #{seckillGoodsId}, #{orderNo}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{payAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, g.goods_name, g.goods_img, g.goods_price FROM seckill_order o LEFT JOIN goods g ON o.goods_id = g.id WHERE o.order_no = #{orderNo}
